meanings.definition: A set of beliefs or attitudes held by someone.
meanings.sent1: Positive mindsets can lead to success in life.
meanings.sent2: Her growth mindset helped her overcome challenges.
meanings.sent3: The cat's mindset about chasing mice was quite determined.
meanings.sent4: His mindset was a fortress, protecting him from negativity.
meanings.sent5: The mindset of kindness can make the world a better place.

meanings.definition: The established set of attitudes held by someone.
meanings.sent1: Different cultures have unique mindsets towards family.
meanings.sent2: His fixed mindset limited his ability to learn new things.
meanings.sent3: The mindset of the tree to grow tall amused the squirrel.
meanings.sent4: Her mindset was a locked box, resistant to change.
meanings.sent5: The mindset of determination can move mountains.
